name: Bloon Rush
description:
Play with 4-8 players online, get points for every track you win, and be the next champion!

We recommend playing with friends online using voice chat.

To win the championship, receive points in every track based on race position.
There are 9 different tracks, whith loops and spikes that you need to avoid.
If your balloon explodes because of a spike, you'll be sent back to the start.
Drop bombs typing "B" so you can blow enemies!

Reach the end of the track and wait for the others while playing a "capture the flag" game and collect extra points!!

Features
Customization: Pick your balloon (different colors and shapes)
9 different tracks!
